block.plethora.manipulator_mark_1.desc: Used to interface with a module from a computer
block.plethora.manipulator_mark_2.desc: Used to interface with multiple modules from a computer.
block.plethora.redstone_integrator.desc: Get and set redstone levels for this block.
item.plethora.neuralConnector.desc: Used to connect to Neural Interfaces.
item.plethora.neuralInterface.desc: Goes in your face slot inside the helmet slot. Connect with the neural connector.
item.plethora.module.module_introspectio: Wraps your inventory as a peripheral. Shift+Use to bind to player.
item.plethora.module.module_keyboard.des: Insert as a neural interface module to type while in-game. Right click a computer up to 32 blocks away to type.
item.plethora.module.module_keyboard.clo: Keyboard open. Press ESC to close.
item.plethora.module.module_kinetic.desc: Allows controlling your body via the neural interface.
item.plethora.module.module_glasses.desc: Renders an overlay over the world.
item.plethora.module.module_scanner.desc: Allows scanning blocks in the vicinity.
item.plethora.module.module_sensor.desc: Detects nearby entities, gathering data about them.
entity.plethora.plethora:laser.name: A Frickin' laser
entity.plethora:laser.name: A Frickin' laser
gui.plethora.neuralInterface.title: Neural Interface
gui.plethora.config.title: Plethora
gui.plethora.config.scanner.title: Scanner
